attributes.action: Recognise the public voice of no confidence in the current PM BJ&Tory government
attributes.additional_details: Because there are too many deaths on the hands of Boris Johnson and this Tory Government. They are not doing their job to work for the people.
attributes.background: I want the government and Parliament to acknowledge their failures related to COVID -19 and how they have let down the UK. I want the government and Parliament to own up to the lies they have told throughout dealing with this crisis and finally take steps, PPE, testing,tracing. Put UK 99% first.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.  

You might like to sign this petition calling for a public inquiry into the handling of coronavirus:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302576
